title: Continuous low priority queue
body:
There is currently a known issue affecting some players who have been placed into the low priority queue, where the timer continuously restarts after completing the countdown. The team responsible for this feature is currently investigating and working to resolve the problem.

This issue is known to affect players with older hardware and/or poor network connections. Our advice is to restart your machine, turn off any other running program and avoid browsing the net or running downloads while the timer is counting down to avoid it falling out of sync with our servers.
